title: Monsters Pack Vol 1
description: This monsters bundle includes 5 monsters ideal for a wide variety of projects, from medieval fantasy to Sci Fi.
longDescription:
Gorosaurus 14278 tris. 4096*4096 textures. 41 bones. 26 animations: sketchfab.com/models/894c38e222534106a26b5e836203dc23

Marhomorph 15112 tris. 4096*4096 textures. 60 bones. 27 animations: sketchfab.com/models/0b1bce8a0e9d442fa73744e9d2d1f8ce

Hellcreeper 16350 tris. 4096*4096 textures. 62 bones. 16 animations: sketchfab.com/models/e13a4ca0d0c745488f3a96bd9b9fc0e2

Cavecrawler 20984 tris. 4096*4096 textures. 41 bones. 24 animations: sketchfab.com/models/337cb8cd9fc74f32b279f1083d2819c2

Tyranopode 29154 tris. 4096*4096 textures. 90 bones. 31 animations: sketchfab.com/models/b24e9c9176bf46f1892c5434ad3b7da2


This bundle includes 5 monsters: Gorosaurus, Marhiomorph, Hellcreeper, Cavecrawler and Tyranopode.


These original monsters will fit in a lot of different genres ranging from Medieval fantasy to SCI FI.All models are rigged ad animated. These creepy ugly creature will use their sharp teeth and claws to tear you apart .These original monsters will fit in a lot of different genres ranging from Medieval fantasy to SCI FI.
